fulltext:
THUY DUONG TRAN 
197/22 Ton That Tung str 
Dong Da, Hanoi (VN) 
Tel: (+84) 799 265566 
Email: 
tranthuyduongqn@gmail.com 
Skype: duongtthanu 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
Full name: Thuy Duong Tran 
Date of birth: 20/05/1993 
Sex: Female 
Marital status: Single 
EDUCATION 
University of Calabria, Cosenza (Italy) — Master’s Degree of 
Science 
10/2015 - 04/2018 
Master in Promotion of Cultural Tourism Systems 
-
 Planning and management of tourism systems - aims to train 
researchers, technicians, managers and officials with integrated 
competences in the perspective of sustainable tourism 
promotion. 
-
The course explores and develops the themes of the planning and 
management of tourism systems and the enhancement of the 
territory 
Hanoi University, Hanoi (Viet Nam) — Bachelor’s Degree 
10/2011 - 05/2015 
Bachelor in Italian Study.  
-
In-depth study of Italian language and culture 
-
Basic research on specialized translation-interpretation and 
tourism 
SKILLS 
Customer service. 
Communication. 
Planning. 
Managing. 
Teamwork. 
Research. 
Guest booking. 
Marketing & Sales. 
Statistical Data Analysis 
Microsoft Office (Word, Exel, 
Access, Power Poin). 
Other: photography 
LANGUAGES 
Fluently in Italian and  English. 
PERSONAL PROJECT 
Master's degree thesis: 
Evaluation of cultural behavior 
towards sustainable tourism 
development: in the case of 
Quang Ninh province - Viet 
Nam  
EXPERIENCE 
Your.Rentals A/S, Hanoi (Viet Nam)— Product Support 
Specialist  
10/2018 - PRESENT 
Your.Rentals A/S is a rental property software, web application 
development and online tourism. Based in Denmark, Sweden, Vietnam 
and Argentina. 
Customer support Department 
-
Responsible for supporting property manager via email and 
webchat (in writing) 
-
Responsible for for supporting travellers: respond to their 
enquiries and questions about the accomodation 
-
Outbound calling to resolve problems with property managers and 
guests 
-
Translation of content for our help center http://help.your.rentals 
-
Researching and fixing geographic mapping issues for new 
listings 
-
Assisting for the technical product manager with simple test 
tasks 
-
Training for new trainee/part-time employees  
HR Department 
-
In charge of recruitment according to job requirements 
https://your.rentals/ 
Creative C Media, Hanoi (Viet Nam) — Production assistant 
and Stylist 
07/2018 - 10/2018 
-
Production assistant and Stylist for the Sitcom project “Love 
Chung Minh”  
“Love Chung Minh”  is a sitcom project consisting of 17 episodes on school 
subjects, coordinated to produce with Boardgame Vietnam Co., LTD. As a 
production assistant and a stylist, I was in charge of casting, managing 
actors and responsible for arranging and coordinating costumes for actors.  
https://www.facebook.com/creativecmediajsc/ 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KbYe-Pp5IM8&t=919s 
Italian language and culture and International mobility 
center, Hanoi (Viet Nam) — Internship Trainee 
06/2015 - 09/2015 
-
Administrative assistant 
-
Support translation of study abroad materials 
-
MarNET JSC, Hanoi (Viet Nam) — Content writer 
07/2014 - 09/2014 
Travel content editor for the tourism website of company 
“Loca.vn” 
https://loca.vn/
